## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1fd81a66a867d353506b97a895921b666f5831fa169eb6cef4e07ef98e259328)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@helvetia-italia/ng-selly-lib-operator-dashboard' @ 10.20.37 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
